author: Steve Webber "Redtail"

review: I would love to yell and scream every profanity I can think of and direct all of it at not only Google, but also Amazon Prime. I purchased the Google Dongle in order to watch Amazon Prime's streaming service. I'm now told by Amazon that Google and Amazon can't seem to get along with each other so now 75% of the reason I bought both service's is now F#%@*^#!!!!! USELESS. Thanks much Amazon and Google. Guess it's time to sell the dongle and get a partial refund from Amazon.  SO VERY DISAPPOINTING THAT THE BIG KIDS CAN'T GET ALONG.
author: Lawrence

review: Video is very jerky to the point of being unwatchable. Streaming works great on netflix, prime and many others so I don't think it is my bandwidth.
